name: Like Nothing On Earth
description: 'Like Nothing On Earth' is a photograph of a deeply personal and uplifting moment when my mother and I hugged for the first time after being separated for six months by lockdown.  A dramatic journey from London to Southern Spain that put me back in my mother's arms once again.  Shared in solidarity with everyone who has been separated from their family during the pandemic.  I filmed the whole journey to see my mother on my iPhone.  You can watch it here: https://youtu.be/L4pO1vp4vE4
